Label: DR_Info_Blue
String:
 Hit a card with your hammer
 to flip it. Try to find all of the
 pairs before time runs out!

Label: DR_Info_Red
String:
 Hit the spinning blocks to stop
 them. Match three of the same
 icon to get a fancy prize.

Label: DR_Info_Yellow
String:
 Pick a pipe—get a prize!
 Mario will always turn when he
 reaches a sideways pipe!

Label: DR_Info_PM
String:
 You've entered an alternate
 dimension of...invisible things!
 Reveal as many things as you
 can within the time limit!

Label: DR_Info_PM_00
String:
 You've entered an alternate
 dimension of...invisible things!
 Use the power of paint to find a
 bunch of 'em to get a bonus!
